H0.text: Gravitational force is the type of force that keeps the planets orbiting the Sun.

H1.text: Magnetic is the type of force that keeps the planets orbiting the Sun.

H2.text: Electrical is the type of force that keeps the planets orbiting the Sun.

H3.text: Nuclear force is the type of force that keeps the planets orbiting the Sun.

A4.text: Newton's law of universal gravitation describes gravity as a force by stating that every particle attracts every other particle in the universe with a force that is proportional to the product of their masses and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between their centers of mass.

A5.text: In Einstein's theory, energy and momentum distort spacetime in their vicinity, and other particles move in trajectories determined by the geometry of spacetime.
